7 int main(int argc, char **argv)
8 {

10 
11  ros::NodeHandle n;
12  ros::ServiceClient client = n.serviceClient<pumpkin_interface::Files>("file_lister");
13  pumpkin_interface::Files srv;
14  srv.request.filetype = _TYPE_CONF;
15  if (client.call(srv))
16  {
17  ROS_INFO("Folder: %s", srv.response.folder.c_str());

19  ROS_INFO("%s", (*it).c_str());
20  }
21  }
22  else
